review_title: Happy to be a part of such a great team
job_title: Regional Finance Officer in Thornhill, Dumfries and Galloway, Scotland
pros: Great team, always an opportunity to grow, onsite training and mentorship programs, multicultural ( great opportunity to talk and share experience with people from other programmes) , all staff friendly and professional
cons: To be honest I can't see any disadvantages of the company

review_title: Great cause, challenging but rewarding work
job_title: Head of Region in Salisbury, England
pros: Sense of mission, making a real difference to the lives of some of the poorest people in the world, fascinating work and a high degree of autonomy.
cons: Not for home birds or anyone wanting an easy life.
